description:
Dynamic Height Adjuster plugin for Bubble enables you to effortlessly adjust any element's height to dynamically fill the remaining space on the screen. Just set the ID of the element, and the plugin takes care of automatically adapting its height, providing responsive and professional-looking layouts without custom code.

Features:

Automatic Height Adjustment: Easily make any element fill the remaining screen height.

Dynamic & Responsive: Automatically adjusts on window resize.

Customizable Margins: Fine-tune spacing dynamically between elements.

No coding needed: Simple and user-friendly configuration, just enter an element ID.

How It Works:

Simply insert the plugin's element into your page, specify the target element's ID, and optionally define a custom margin. Your element instantly adjusts its height dynamically on load and window resize events.

Usage Scenarios:

Expand repeating groups dynamically.

Create dashboards or layouts that perfectly fit any screen size.

Responsive applications that automatically adapt layouts without extra complexity.
name: Dynamic Height Adjuster
plugin_instructions:
Step-by-step Guide to Setup Dynamic Height Adjuster in your Bubble app:

1. Install & Insert Plugin Element
Install the "Dynamic Height Adjuster" plugin via Bubble’s plugin tab.

Drag and drop the plugin element onto your page. (It’s an invisible element.)

2. Configure the Element ID
Select the Dynamic Height Adjuster element on your Bubble editor page.

In the element’s property panel, specify the Target Element ID.
(Ensure the target element has the matching ID set in Bubble’s properties.)

3. Adjust Custom Margin (optional)
By default, the plugin uses a 20px margin at the bottom.

If needed, specify a custom margin value (in pixels) directly in the plugin’s property panel to refine the layout precisely.

4. No Workflow Needed
The plugin runs automatically when the page loads.

Height adjustment dynamically triggers on browser resize, providing instant responsiveness without additional workflows.

5. Preview & Test
Preview your page and watch as your specified element dynamically adjusts height perfectly.
